sentiment_score_definition: x <= -0.35: Bearish; -0.35 < x <= -0.15: Somewhat-Bearish; -0.15 < x < 0.15: Neutral; 0.15 <= x < 0.35: Somewhat_Bullish; x >= 0.35: Bullish
relevance_score_definition: 0 < x <= 1, with a higher score indicating higher relevance.

feed.title: iShares收益最佳化債券ETF-BYLD-ETF基本資料
feed.summary: This article provides comprehensive basic information for the iShares Yield Optimized Bond ETF (BYLD). It details the ETF's issuer (iShares/BlackRock), trading exchange (NYSE), inception date (April 22, 2014), current size, market price, net asset value, dividend frequency, expense ratios, and the Morningstar U.S. Bond Market Yield-Optimized Index it tracks. The investment strategy aims to optimize current income while maintaining long-term capital appreciation from a diversified fixed-income portfolio.

feed.title: BSVO Stock Fund Price and Chart — NASDAQ:BSVO
feed.summary: The article provides a detailed overview of the EA Bridgeway Omni Small-Cap Value ETF (BSVO), including its current price, performance metrics, key statistics like AUM and expense ratio, and a description of its investment strategy. It covers various aspects like holdings, technical analysis, seasonal trends, and answers frequently asked questions about ETFs and BSVO specifically.

feed.title: BlueLinx bets on AI as it navigates a soft housing market
feed.summary: BlueLinx Holdings Inc. is strategically retooling its digital operations with a strong focus on artificial intelligence, expanding internal AI tools for employees despite a soft housing market that resulted in flat full-year sales for 2025. CEO Shyam Reddy expressed caution about investing heavily in traditional e-commerce platforms, given the rapid changes AI could bring to customer ordering processes. The company reported a slight sales increase in Q4 2025 but a significant decline in full-year net income, while emphasizing growth in specialty products and progress in its digital modernization and warehouse technology initiatives.

feed.title: BSMC Stock Fund Price and Chart — CBOE:BSMC
feed.summary: The Brandes U.S. Small-Mid Cap Value ETF (BSMC) aims for long-term capital growth by investing in undervalued U.S. small-mid cap equity securities using a bottom-up, value-driven approach. The ETF is actively managed, has an expense ratio of 0.71%, and currently trades at a premium with a dividend yield of 1.06%. It was launched on October 3, 2023, and has accumulated $160.59 million in assets under management.

feed.title: Coinshares Bitcoin And Ether ETF (NASDAQ: BTF) - Dividends
feed.summary: This article provides a list of past and upcoming dividend distributions for the Coinshares Bitcoin And Ether ETF (NASDAQ: BTF). It details cash dividend amounts, ex-dividend dates, and payment dates stretching from December 2023 to September 2025, alongside the current share price and 7-day average price.

feed.title: Saba fund shows 12.2% payout rate, warns some may be return of capital
feed.summary: Saba Capital Income & Opportunities Fund II (SABA) announced its monthly distribution of $0.058 per share, estimating that 100% comes from net investment income. The fund has a 12.17% annualized distribution rate, but warns that distributions might include return of capital, which does not reflect investment performance and could reduce the fund's net asset value. Shareholders will receive a Form 1099-DIV for tax reporting purposes at year-end.

feed.title: Autodesk, Inc. $ADSK Shares Purchased by TD Asset Management Inc
feed.summary: TD Asset Management Inc increased its stake in Autodesk, Inc. (NASDAQ:ADSK) by 3.5% in the third quarter, bringing its total holdings to 145,868 shares valued at $46.338 million. This comes after Autodesk reported strong fiscal Q4 results, exceeding revenue and EPS estimates, and provided an optimistic FY2027 outlook, which has garnered positive sentiment and lifted price targets from several analysts. Despite some neutral sentiment regarding mixed analyst moves and insider selling, the company's financial performance and demand indicators suggest sustained upside.

feed.title: US Bancorp DE Lowers Holdings in Alphabet Inc. $GOOG
feed.summary: US Bancorp DE reduced its stake in Alphabet Inc. (NASDAQ:GOOG) by 1.9% in the third quarter of 2025, selling 37,726 shares and retaining 1,939,051 shares. Despite this reduction by one institutional investor, other major firms like Vanguard Group, State Street Corp, and JPMorgan Chase & Co. significantly increased their holdings in Alphabet. The company reported strong quarterly earnings, beating expectations, and analysts maintain a "Buy" consensus rating with a target price of $343.90, even amidst regulatory probes and intensifying AI competition.

feed.title: Key Market Insights
feed.summary: Cardio Diagnostics Holdings Inc. (CDIO) stocks surged by 16.09%, driven by optimistic market sentiment ahead of a strategic investor call to unveil AI-powered cardiac testing technologies. Despite current negative profitability metrics and fiscal strains, the company maintains strong liquidity. Technical analysis reveals recent volatility, with key resistance and support levels noted, and future prospects largely depend on effectively translating innovation into financial resilience and clear revenue generation.

feed.title: Freeport McMoRan Rose 6% This Week. Here’s Where the Stock Could Go in 2026
feed.summary: Freeport-McMoRan (FCX) saw its stock rise 6% this week, driven by stronger copper prices, expanded Indonesian mining rights, and increased institutional investment. The stock is nearing its 52-week high, with analysts' valuation models suggesting a target price of $91, implying a 33% upside. The company's future performance hinges on continued copper price strength, operational execution at its Grasberg mine, and scaling U.S. leach production.

feed.title: Diamondback Energy Reveals 900 Barnett Locations: Analysts See 50% Upside
feed.summary: Diamondback Energy (FANG) has revealed 900 new Barnett locations in the Permian Basin, shifting its focus to organic growth. Analysts have raised their price targets, with TD Cowen increasing its target to $190 and Siebert Williams maintaining a Buy rating with the same target. The company's new Barnett and Woodford zones boast higher oil production per lateral foot and targeted cost reductions, leading to a re-rating of FANG by the market as a technology-led compounder with significant upside potential.

Despite this reduction by one institutional investor, other firms like Vanguard Group Inc. and Massachusetts Financial Services Co. MA increased their stakes. feed.title: TD Asset Management Inc Sells 16,249 Shares of Intercontinental Exchange Inc. $ICE

feed.title: MGM Resorts International (MGM): A Bull Case Theory
feed.summary: This article summarizes a bullish thesis on MGM Resorts International (MGM), highlighting several near-term and long-term catalysts. Key drivers include aggressive share buybacks, profitability and cash distributions from BetMGM, proceeds from the Northfield Park sale, stabilization of Las Vegas Strip operations, and the long-term potential of the Osaka integrated resort in Japan. The company is projected to trade at roughly 7x Owner Earnings with a target price of up to $46 per share.

feed.title: A Look At Duke Energy (DUK) Valuation After Nuclear Reliability Milestone And Analyst Upgrades
feed.summary: Duke Energy (DUK) has recently achieved a record nuclear fleet reliability of 96.9% for 2025, which is projected to generate approximately US$600 million in federal tax credits. This milestone has led to positive analyst commentary, strengthening the company's earnings outlook and investor confidence. While an earnings-based valuation suggests DUK is slightly undervalued at $130.89 with a fair value of $135.71, a discounted cash flow (DCF) model indicates the stock might be overvalued with an estimated future cash flow value of $60.22.

feed.title: Raymond James: $400 Million Advisory Team Joins Independent Channel In Iowa
feed.summary: Financial advisors Michael Compiano and Dan Porter, who managed over $400 million in client assets, have moved their practice, Two Oaks Wealth, to Raymond James Financial Services' independent channel. Based in West Des Moines, Iowa, they offer comprehensive financial planning, retirement guidance, and wealth counseling. The move highlights Raymond James' momentum in attracting advisors seeking resources and flexibility while maintaining independence.

feed.title: TD Asset Management Inc Sells 9,436 Shares of Emerson Electric Co. $EMR
feed.summary: TD Asset Management Inc. reduced its stake in Emerson Electric Co. by 3.5% during the third quarter, selling 9,436 shares, and now holds 258,845 shares valued at approximately $33.96 million. Despite this, Emerson Electric reported strong quarterly EPS, set optimistic FY2026 guidance, and announced a quarterly dividend. Institutional investors collectively own about 74.3% of the company's stock, while insiders sold a total of 15,442 shares in the last quarter.

feed.title: TD Asset Management Inc Raises Position in DTE Energy Company $DTE
feed.summary: TD Asset Management Inc. has increased its stake in DTE Energy Company by 2.9%, bringing its total holdings to 240,696 shares valued at approximately $34.04 million. DTE Energy reported strong quarterly earnings, beating consensus estimates with $1.65 EPS and $4.43 billion in revenue, and announced a quarterly dividend of $1.165 per share. Institutional investors now own 76.06% of the company's stock, and analysts maintain a "Moderate Buy" consensus rating with an average price target of $151.31.

feed.title: Exact Sciences Vote Clears Path To Abbott Deal And Valuation Recheck
feed.summary: Shareholders of Exact Sciences (NasdaqCM:EXAS) have approved the company's acquisition by Abbott Laboratories, a move expected to significantly reshape Exact Sciences' role in the diagnostics industry. The deal is seen as a strategic step for larger players seeking scale and expanded test portfolios. Investors are now advised to focus on Abbott's integration plans, the deal's terms, and its potential impact on the combined entity.

feed.title: Burlington’s 2026 Expansion Plans Test Valuation And Debt Profile
feed.summary: Burlington Stores (NYSE:BURL) announced plans to open 110 net new stores and expand its corporate office in New York by 2026, signaling a significant growth trajectory. This expansion comes as the company's shares trade below analyst targets but above Simply Wall St's estimated fair value, with past stock performance reflecting a period of expansion. Investors should consider the implications of increased spending on these new stores and office space, especially given the company's flagged high debt levels and non-cash earnings.

feed.title: Lowe’s quietly edges past Home Depot in battle for shoppers
feed.summary: Lowe's has recently surpassed Home Depot in a key competitive metric, achieving a 1.3% comparable sales increase in Q4 2025 compared to Home Depot's 0.3%. Despite this gain, Lowe's CEO Marvin Ellison remains cautious due to "persistent volatility in the housing macro" and subdued consumer confidence, influencing big-ticket DIY projects. Both retailers are heavily investing in AI to enhance customer service and drive sales, with Lowe's leading in consumer satisfaction according to a J.D. Power survey.

feed.title: TD Asset Management Inc Sells 226,787 Shares of CoStar Group, Inc. $CSGP
feed.summary: TD Asset Management Inc significantly reduced its stake in CoStar Group, selling 226,787 shares and now owning 455,430 shares worth approximately $38.4 million. Despite CoStar exceeding Q4 revenue and EPS estimates, raising 2026 guidance, and approving a $1.5 billion share buyback, the stock hit a 12-month low of $43.17 after several analysts cut price targets and ratings. CoStar Group currently has a "Moderate Buy" rating from analysts with an average price target of $73.35.

feed.title: Apple to buy more than 100 million chips from TSMC’s Arizona fab by year’s end
feed.summary: Apple Inc. announced plans to purchase over 100 million computer chips from Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.'s (TSMC) Arizona plant by the end of 2026. This move is part of Apple's $600 billion commitment to bolster U.S. manufacturing. Apple's global head of procurement, David Tom, stated the company intends to buy as much output as possible from the Arizona fab.

feed.title: Brown & Brown, Inc. (BRO): A Bull Case Theory
feed.summary: This article summarizes a bullish thesis on Brown & Brown, Inc. (BRO) from The Steady Investing’s Substack, highlighting its strong competitive advantages, robust financial performance over the past decade, and strategic capital allocation. Despite a recent stock depreciation, the analysis suggests BRO is undervalued with a potential 40% upside to $110, making it an attractive long-term investment. The company is characterized as a high-quality, serially acquisitive compounder with resilient growth due to its lean, decentralized structure and recurring revenue model.

feed.title: Apple Inc. $AAPL Shares Purchased by TD Waterhouse Canada Inc.
feed.summary: TD Waterhouse Canada Inc. increased its stake in Apple Inc. (AAPL) by 2.0% in the third quarter, making AAPL its fourth largest holding. Other major institutional investors like Vanguard Group Inc. and State Street Corp also boosted their positions. Analysts have issued varied ratings, with a consensus of "Moderate Buy" and a price target of $293.41, while Apple also announced a quarterly dividend and recent positive news surrounding product launches and market expansion.

feed.title: Vanguard Group Inc. Cuts Stock Holdings in KANZHUN LIMITED Sponsored ADR $BZ

Despite this, other institutional investors increased their holdings in the company. KANZHUN LIMITED, operating the Boss Zhipin platform, maintains a "Moderate Buy" rating from analysts with an average price target of $24.00.

feed.title: NetApp, Inc. (NASDAQ:NTAP) Q3 2026 Earnings Call Transcript
feed.summary: NetApp, Inc. reported strong Q3 2026 results, exceeding revenue and EPS expectations with $1.71 billion in revenue and $2.12 EPS. The company highlighted its accelerated growth, record profitability, and pivotal role in AI-driven innovation, including successful deployment at Super Bowl LX. NetApp also discussed strategies for managing rising memory prices, expanding its Public Cloud Services, and the increasing adoption of its AI solutions like AFX and AI Data Engine.

feed.title: Autodesk, Inc. (NASDAQ:ADSK) Q4 2026 Earnings Call Transcript
feed.summary: Autodesk, Inc. reported strong Q4 and full-year fiscal 2026 results, exceeding guidance for billings, revenue, operating margin, EPS, and free cash flow. The company emphasized its strategic focus on cloud-based platforms, AI integration in its products, and go-to-market optimization, which involved a restructuring to shift incentives towards new business acquisition. Autodesk's leadership highlighted the company's unique position to leverage agentic AI with its vast data, industry context, and expertise, particularly in the architecture, engineering, construction, and manufacturing sectors.

feed.title: BellRing Brands, Inc. (BRBR): A Bull Case Theory
feed.summary: This article summarizes a bullish thesis on BellRing Brands, Inc. (BRBR), highlighting its strong position in the protein-based nutrition market with brands like Premier Protein and Dymatize. The company has demonstrated robust financial performance, including significant revenue and profit growth over the past five years, driven by consumer trends toward health and fitness. Despite competition, its premium branding and broad product lineup position it for sustained growth and profitability.

feed.title: Gartner, Inc. (IT): A Bull Case Theory
feed.summary: This article summarizes a bullish thesis on Gartner, Inc. (IT) from MarTech Square, focusing on the company's role in legitimizing Decision Intelligence Platforms (DIPs). Gartner’s Magic Quadrant for DIPs highlights a transformative opportunity in enterprise decision-making, positioning decisions as operational assets crucial for an AI-driven world. The article suggests that vendors recognized as leaders in this space, like Gartner, will see accelerating adoption, revenue growth, and a compelling investment case.

feed.title: Phillips 66 Stock Near Record Highs: Take Profits Or Stay Long?
feed.summary: Phillips 66 (PSX) is currently trading near all-time highs, driven by strong refining margins, aggressive share buybacks, and a streamlined portfolio, leading to fresh Wall Street upgrades. The company's performance is underpinned by resilient US demand, tight global inventories, and a focus on returning cash to shareholders. Investors are now weighing whether PSX can maintain this momentum given potential shifts in crack spreads and interest rates, making it a critical stock for those investing in US energy.

feed.title: Vanguard Group Inc. Sells 14,313 Shares of Bank of Hawaii Corporation $BOH

feed.title: Vestmark Advisory Solutions Inc. Trims Stock Holdings in Microchip Technology Incorporated $MCHP
